name: prominently
content:
prominently adverb
(EASILY SEEN)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that can easily be seen or noticed: A photograph of her daughter was prominently displayed on her desk. The newspaper featured the apology prominently on page 1.
in a way that sticks out from a surface: I left the book lying around with a bookmark protruding prominently from the last chapter.
More examplesFewer examplesAll dentists will have to prominently display price lists and details of what services are available outside their surgery. Having spelling mistakes and typos highlighted so prominently is distracting to the reader.All ready-to-eat food should be prominently labelled with its calorie content.Veins stood out prominently on his forehead.

(IMPORTANTLY)
